nodes.text: Larrot was a male Human living during the Galactic War. A member of the Supreme Guard, he protected Supreme Chancellor Dorian Janarus during the Battle of Corellia in 3640 BBY. While the Chancellor was aboard the Founder, the vessel was attacked by the Bounty Hunter who was after him on the orders of Darth Tormen. Larrot and the Supreme Guard tried to stop the bounty hunter, but were killed.
Larrot appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Bounty Hunter class mission "Number One With a Bullet".
